attributes.action: Help to our Steel manufacturing industries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the last 6 months due to massive rises in steel (and lesserly so energy prices and diesel) our entire engineering sector is at risk of collapse.  Further massive prices are expected with £1000 per tonne expected by Christmas (was £365 last December).

If this continues as expected then 10's of 1000 of workers will be unemployed by the end of the year and another great industry will be lost and we will be even more a country of "service industries".

Steel prices are run by a monopoly in the UK so please put pressure on the company or limit steel prices as other companies have done before it is too late.
